summary: Premium healthcare website redesign for Oishi Heal Touch clinic (Kolkata) - visual UI/UX enhancement maintaining existing layout and brand colors
architectural_notes: Healthcare website for Oishi Heal Touch clinic in Kolkata
Maintain existing layout structure and brand color palette - only enhance visual design
Target premium, modern aesthetic inspired by SaaS UI and Apple-style spacing
Mobile-first approach - most traffic is mobile
Keep animations elegant and lightweight - no heavy animation libraries
Use glassmorphism, gradient overlays, soft shadows for depth
Modern font pairing: Inter/Poppins-style for headings, clean sans-serif for body
Performance-optimized with clean HTML & CSS structure

existing_features.title: Apply premium visual styling across all pages: add soft glassmorphism effects to key sections, use smooth gradient overlays using existing brand colors (medical blue/teal), add depth with soft shadows (box-shadow with blur 20-40px, not harsh), increase white space for luxury feel, improve section separation with subtle background variations, and add elegant border radius (12px-20px to cards and containers)

Upgrade typography system: use Inter or Poppins-style bold geometric sans-serif for headings, clean minimal sans-serif for body text, increase hero heading size significantly, use softer subtext colors (reduce opacity or use muted variants), improve line-height for readability, and add slight letter spacing (0.02em-0.05em) for premium feel

Enhance hero section on HomePage: add subtle background gradient blur effect, add soft floating shapes (minimal, elegant, using CSS), implement smooth fade-in animation on page load, upgrade CTA buttons to rounded pill style with soft gradient background using brand colors, and add subtle hover animation (scale 1.05 with glow effect)

Enhance service cards across all pages: maintain existing grid layout but add hover lift effect (translateY -8px to -12px), add soft shadow depth that increases on hover, implement animated icon hover with micro movement (scale or rotate), add subtle gradient border glow on hover, add smooth transition animation (0.3s ease-in-out), and style cards to feel like premium SaaS design

Redesign all primary action buttons (Book Appointment, Call Now, View Doctors) across all pages: convert to rounded pill style, add soft shadow, apply gradient background using brand colors, implement hover glow effect, and add subtle click animation (scale down slightly on active state)

Upgrade mobile experience: improve spacing between elements with increased padding and margins, make all buttons larger and touch-friendly (minimum 48px height), add sticky bottom CTA with glassmorphism effect that remains visible during scroll, and implement smooth scroll reveal animations for content sections

Implement elegant micro-interactions throughout the site: add smooth scroll reveal animations for sections appearing as user scrolls, add hover transitions to interactive elements, implement button ripple or glow effect on interaction, add subtle icon animations (rotate, scale, or bounce on hover), and ensure all animations are elegant and performant without being flashy

new_feature_requests.summary: Premium visual design upgrade with glassmorphism, gradients, shadows, and improved spacing
Typography upgrade with modern font pairing (Inter/Poppins style) and improved hierarchy
Hero section enhancement with gradient blur, floating shapes, fade-in animation, and premium CTA button
Service cards enhancement with hover lift effects, shadow depth, animated icons, and gradient border glow
Redesign buttons (Book Appointment, Call Now, View Doctors) with pill style, gradients, shadows, and hover effects
Mobile experience upgrade with improved spacing, larger touch-friendly buttons, sticky bottom CTA, and smooth scroll animations
Add micro-interactions: scroll reveal animations, hover transitions, button ripple/glow effects, and subtle icon animations
